name: Dirty Blood (itch)
description:
Hey Mates!

This is our production for clients game that we made. It was a very enlightening experience, working to deadlines and having curve balls thrown at us.

This project was done by me, Alex De'Oliveira and James Porley. I'm very impressed with what we were able to pull off in only a 5 week period.

My contributions to this project were, programming everything, this included learning xml file reading, having input on dialogue and narrative, system design and game feel and ui design.

C&C is more then welcome, it is unlikely that we'll ever go back to this project, but I'm always wanting to improve!

Cheers Mates!

Andrew.
